<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 345, 234, 364]]<|/det|>
Quadratic equation

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 345, 655, 364]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 365, 561, 400]]<|/det|>
\[x = \frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^{2} - 4ac}}{2a}\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 444, 227, 463]]<|/det|>
Binomial theorem

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 435, 908, 482]]<|/det|>
\((a + b)^{n} = a^{n} + \binom{n}{1} a^{n - 1}b + \binom{n}{2} a^{n - 2}b^{2} + \ldots +\binom{n}{r} a^{n - r}b^{r} + \ldots +b^{n},\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 481, 771, 523]]<|/det|>
where \(n\) is a positive integer and \(\binom{n}{r} = \frac{n!}{(n - r)!r!}\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 552, 217, 570]]<|/det|>
Arithmetic series

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 551, 527, 570]]<|/det|>
\(u_{n} = a + (n - 1)d\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 570, 670, 600]]<|/det|>
\[S_{n} = \frac{1}{2} n(a + l) = \frac{1}{2} n\{2a + (n - 1)d\}\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 630, 217, 648]]<|/det|>
Geometric series

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 628, 490, 648]]<|/det|>
\(u_{n} = a r^{n - 1}\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 648, 574, 682]]<|/det|>
\[S_{n} = \frac{a(1 - r^{n})}{1 - r} \quad (r \neq 1)\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 682, 551, 712]]<|/det|>
\[S_{\infty} = \frac{a}{1 - r} \quad (|r| < 1)\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 739, 158, 757]]<|/det|>
Identities

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 737, 551, 789]]<|/det|>
\[\begin{array}{l}\sin^{2}A + \cos^{2}A = 1\\ \sec^{2}A = 1 + \tan^{2}A\\ \cosec^{2}A = 1 + \cot^{2}A \end{array}\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[80, 828, 240, 846]]<|/det|>
Formulas for \(\Delta ABC\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[390, 821, 578, 900]]<|/det|>
\[\begin{array}{l}\frac{a}{\sin A} = \frac{b}{\sin B} = \frac{c}{\sin C}\\ a^{2} = b^{2} + c^{2} - 2bc\cos A\\ \Delta = \frac{1}{2} ab\sin C \end{array}\]
